# SOLUTION
# https://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/1281/A

import re

def shovel_packages(n, k):
    """
    >>> shovel_packages(8, 7)
    2
    >>> shovel_packages(8, 1)
    8
    >>> shovel_packages(6, 10)
    1
    >>> shovel_packages(999999733, 999999732)
    999999733
    >>> shovel_packages(999999733, 999999733)
    1
    """
    x = n // k
    return n // x if n % x == 0 else n // (x + 1)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    import doctest
    doctest.testmod()
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        n, k = map(int, re.findall(r"\d+", input()))
        print(shovel_packages(n, k))

def main():
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        n,k = map(int, input().split())
        print(n//k + (1 if n%k != 0 else 0))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# SOLUTION
# https://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/1281/A

import re

def shovel_packages(n, k):
    """
    >>> shovel_packages(8, 7) 2
    >>> shovel_packages(8, 1) 8
    >>> shovel_packages(6, 10) 1
    >>> shovel_packages(999999733, 999999732) 999999733
    >>> shovel_packages(999999733, 999999733) 1
    """
    x = n // k
    return n // x if n % x == 0 else n // (x + 1)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    import doctest
    doctest.testmod()
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        n, k = map(int, re.findall(r"\d+", input()))
        print(shovel_packages(n, k))

# test 2
from math import ceil

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    print(ceil(n/k))

def main():
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        n,k = map(int, input().split())
        print(n//k + (1 if n%k > 0 else 0))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        n,k = map(int, input().split())
        print(n//k + (1 if n%k != 0 else 0)) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
